column4: is there any app which I can use for mixing music? and is there some dj-app for linux?
check out http://ubuntustudio.org - you might like that
yeah I know about ubuntustudio, but I recently installed 7.10 so I don't want to reinstall again :( but you know which app can be used for mixing tracks? is Ardour or Rosegarden for stuff like that?
i don't remember what what is called...
